Module it.polimi.ingsw.am07
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am07.client.cli.rendering.field

Class CLIGameFieldRepresentation

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am07.client.cli.rendering.field.CLIGameFieldRepresentation
All Implemented Interfaces:
CLIElement
public class CLIGameFieldRepresentation extends Object implements CLIElement
Renders the Game Field in the Command Line Interface (CLI). This class is responsible for creating a visual representation of the game field, including all placed cards and their positions.

  • Constructor Details

    • CLIGameFieldRepresentation

      public CLIGameFieldRepresentation(GameField field)
      Constructs a new CLIGameFieldRepresentation. Initializes the field representation and keeps a reference to the GameField.
      Parameters:
      field - the GameField to be rendered

  • Method Details

    • mapToCliPosition

      static GameFieldPosition mapToCliPosition(GameFieldPosition position, int width, int height, int overlap)
      Maps a card's GameFieldPosition to a position inside the rendered field. This method adjusts the position to account for the size and overlap of card representations.
      Parameters:
      position - the original GameFieldPosition to map
      width - the width of a card representation
      height - the height of a card representation
      overlap - the amount of overlap between adjacent cards
      Returns:
      the transformed GameFieldPosition for the CLI representation

    • addSideAt

      private void addSideAt(Side side, GameFieldPosition position)
      Adds a Side (card face) to the field representation at the specified position. This method translates the game field coordinates to the CLI representation coordinates.
      Parameters:
      side - the Side to add
      position - the position to add the Side at, in GameField coordinates

    • updateFieldRepresentation

      private boolean updateFieldRepresentation()
      Updates the field representation with the current state of the GameField. This method checks for changes in the game field and updates the representation accordingly.
      Returns:
      true if the field representation was updated, false if no changes were detected

    • render

      public String render()
      Renders the Game Field.
      Specified by:
      render in interface CLIElement
      Returns:
      the rendered Game Field, which can be printed to the CLI
